page.title: 10HERTINGFORDBURY SCHOOL'85 I
page.content: Our school is much different from the school when it was built 134 years ago.Our teachers are Mrs.Davies, Mrs.Blannin,Mrs.Levinge,Mr.Mackey(Head master),Mrs.Lawson(music teacher) Mrs.Kirk(reading teacher).Mrs.Davies teaches the lower infants.Mrs.Blannin teaches the upper infants.Mrs.Levinge the lower juniors and Mr.Mackey teachers the upper juniors.At 12.00 a.m we go into diner.There are two sittings.There are 6 tables in the first sitting.The bottom 2 classes go into dinner along with a duty crew of 6 people from class 4 to look after them and pour their water and everything.Our dinner ladies are Mrs.Hart(head cook)Mrs.Griffiths, Mrs.Kirk and Mrs.Oakes.They cook delicious meals for us. Here is the timetable for class 4 Monday:Swimming,lunch,topic,home.....
